channel.title: Need help with z508
channel.description: i just downloaded z 508 and im planing on hosting it. I just need help with the ::pvp command i want it so you don't have to do it, and its all pvp. and yes ive changed the coords and put the coords that the command gives and changed it to the coords that a person arrives at when they first create there account but after you logg out the first time and logg back in its not pvp but normal then u have to do ::pvp again. I want to make it so everytime you logg in its like the pvp command is already done.
